attributes.action:
Shut down construction sites
They are not key workers
attributes.additional_details:
To prevent the spread of coronavirus by shutting down construction sites
They are not key workers
attributes.background:
Construction workers are not classed as key workers.
Its extremely difficult to work 2m apart on a site due to specific technical tasks 
Some sites have hundreds of contractors working at the same time on the same site
Parliament need to re-consider their decision on this.
